hero.title: Empowering Agriculture with Actionable AI Insights
hero.subtitle: Join us in transforming Indian agriculture. Farm Brahma provides FPOs, retailers, and partners with the data-driven tools needed to boost yields, increase profitability, and build a resilient supply chain.

problem.title: The Uncertainty in Modern Farming
problem.description: Farmers face constant challenges: unpredictable weather, volatile market prices, soil degradation, and pest attacks. Making the right decision at the right time is critical, but access to reliable, localized, and actionable information is often lacking.

smarterDecisions.title: Smarter Decisions
smarterDecisions.description: Hyper-local weather, soil analysis, and market trends to guide crop selection and timing.

increasedProfitability.title: Increased Profitability

reducedRisk.title: Reduced Risk
reducedRisk.description: Proactive pest/disease alerts and personalized risk analysis for every crop.
